name: PDH - Paltry Duck Hunt
description:
Made for 'so bad it's good' jam.

Join the discord server for help, to give feedback on game, or really to talk about anything else related to it!

NEW IN THE V1.1 UPDATE: THE LIMO

Here it comes! It is long, slow, black-painted and turning with difficulty vehicle made to suit the needs of the most important of very important people. And it makes beautiful sound - the sound this engine makes is a pleasure for your ears!

Find out more about v1.1 update here.

FEATURES:

  • Big, open world that provides hours of gameplay!
  • Lot of different vehicles!
  • Massive amount of weapons!

Use WASD/Arrow keys to move, E to enter vehicles and left mouse button to shoot.

Your goal is to kill them  all ducks. And try to survive while doing that.

GTA parody.
